import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './Navbar.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Product from '../pages/Product'; function Navbar() { function showSidebar(){ const sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar'); sidebar.style.display = 'flex'; } function closeSidebar(){ const sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar'); sidebar.style.display = 'none'; } return (
